hasAttributes.name: BusinessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited. Must match a Business_Unit_Code in the Business_Unit_Listing file.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetID
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier; may require a concatenation, such as Business_Unit_Code + Fixed_Asset_Code.

hasAttributes.name: SerialNumber
hasAttributes.description: Tracked by serial number. True or false.

hasAttributes.name: DepreciationRate
hasAttributes.description: Depreciation rate (e.g. percentage).

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetDepreciableBasis
hasAttributes.description: Depreciable basis of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetReplacementCost
hasAttributes.description: Replacement cost of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAccount
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recorded for unrealized gain/loss.

hasAttributes.name: LotNumber
hasAttributes.description: Tracked by lot number. True or false.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetFairValue
hasAttributes.description: Fair value of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: SupplierID
hasAttributes.description: Supplier ID

hasAttributes.name: LocationID
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for organizations. May require a concatenation of items such as Business_Unit_Code and Location_Code.

hasAttributes.name: LocationCode
hasAttributes.description: Code used to identify fixed asset location at local, rather than organizational, level.

hasAttributes.name: LocationDescription
hasAttributes.description: Textual description of location identified by Location_Code.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetCode
hasAttributes.description: An internal ID at the local level for tracking this fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: ProjectID
hasAttributes.description: ID where an asset is part of a larger project

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetBarCode
hasAttributes.description: UPC or other external identifier, such as the product code from a primary vendor.

hasAttributes.name: ManufacturerID
hasAttributes.description: Manufacturer of fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: VendorID
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for the primary vendor of the fixed asset.  Must match a Vendor_ID in the Vendors file.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetClass
hasAttributes.description: Class of fixed asset, e.g. Land, Buildings, Machinery, etc.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetQuantityOnHand
hasAttributes.description: Quantity of fixed asset items on hand.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetOriginalCost
hasAttributes.description: Original cost of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetNetBookValue
hasAttributes.description: Net book value of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetAccumulatedDepreciation
hasAttributes.description: Accumulated dpreciation for asset (Life to date)

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetUsefulLifeRemaining
hasAttributes.description: Remaining useful life of the fixed asset in months.

hasAttributes.name: CurrencyID
hasAttributes.description: Identification of the currency used in this report.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetAcquisitionDate
hasAttributes.description: Date that fixed asset is purchased or acquired.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetInactiveFlag
hasAttributes.description: Flag indicating whether the fixed asset is inactive, (e.g. idle), or that the fixed asset account is inactive, (i.e. no other activity should be posted to the account).

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetInServiceDate
hasAttributes.description: Date that fixed asset is placed in service.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetRetirementDate
hasAttributes.description: Date that fixed asset is taken out of service.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetDisposalDate
hasAttributes.description: Date that fixed asset is disposed.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetAvailableforSaleDate
hasAttributes.description: Date that fixed asset is available for sale.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssettobeAbandonedorDisposedofOtherthanbyforSaleDate
hasAttributes.description: Date that fixed asset is abandoned, disposed of, or retired.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetAssetAccount
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recognized after asset is placed in service.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetCIPAccount
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recognized before asset is placed in service.  Asset in construction

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetCIPFlag
hasAttributes.description: Flag indicating whether the fixed asset is recorded as CIP as of the report date.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetDepreciationAccount
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which Income Statement amount is recognized for depreciation.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetAccumulatedDepreciationAccount
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recognized for accumulated depreciation.
